timeline.bodyText: While we're looking at performance, I wonder if we should also look at making this dependent on distance squared. I realise that it makes some difference to getting bbActivationRange and Math.round() - but the activation range would then be Math.pow(bbActivationRange - 0.5, 2) due to the current rounding, and such rounding would not be required.
timeline.author: dualspiral

replies.bodyText:
Good point.
I've switched to Vector3i#distanceSquared (which returns an int, so there's no need for rounding).
replies.author: ImMorpheus
